space_invaders.name: Zog
space_invaders.funny_fact: Zog loves to eat asteroid sandwiches!

space_invaders.name: Glix
space_invaders.funny_fact: Glix communicates through intergalactic dance moves!

space_invaders.name: Blip
space_invaders.funny_fact: Blip is afraid of black holes!

space_invaders.name: Flurp
space_invaders.funny_fact: Flurp once mistook a comet for a giant space marshmallow!

space_invaders.name: Snix
space_invaders.funny_fact: Snix dreams of opening a space-themed bakery!

space_invaders.name: Klop
space_invaders.funny_fact: Klop's favorite hobby is asteroid surfing!

space_invaders.name: Dweeb
space_invaders.funny_fact: Dweeb collects space rocks as souvenirs!

space_invaders.name: Bloop
space_invaders.funny_fact: Bloop's spaceship runs on cosmic energy!

space_invaders.name: Quix
space_invaders.funny_fact: Quix is a master at zero-gravity yoga!

space_invaders.name: Chirp
space_invaders.funny_fact: Chirp has a secret stash of space disco music!

space_invaders.name: Zorp
space_invaders.funny_fact: Zorp can juggle six asteroids at once!

space_invaders.name: Fiz
space_invaders.funny_fact: Fiz has a pet nebula named Fluffy!

space_invaders.name: Gloop
space_invaders.funny_fact: Gloop plays the cosmic harmonica!

space_invaders.name: Plip
space_invaders.funny_fact: Plip loves meteor showers, but only from a distance!

space_invaders.name: Tron
space_invaders.funny_fact: Tron once won a galactic hula hoop contest!

space_invaders.name: Wib
space_invaders.funny_fact: Wib's favorite food is cosmic cotton candy!

space_invaders.name: Yip
space_invaders.funny_fact: Yip dreams of being a space DJ!

space_invaders.name: Nix
space_invaders.funny_fact: Nix can recite the entire history of the universe!

space_invaders.name: Vorb
space_invaders.funny_fact: Vorb once caught a shooting star bare-handed!

space_invaders.name: Zeep
space_invaders.funny_fact: Zeep can speak over 50 alien languages!

space_invaders.name: Clop
space_invaders.funny_fact: Clop is a space yoga instructor!

space_invaders.name: Droop
space_invaders.funny_fact: Droop enjoys stargazing while sipping comet tea!

space_invaders.name: Xip
space_invaders.funny_fact: Xip's spaceship is shaped like a giant space peanut!

space_invaders.name: Rup
space_invaders.funny_fact: Rup can teleport short distances!

space_invaders.name: Trix
space_invaders.funny_fact: Trix can mimic the sound of any spaceship!

space_invaders.name: Floop
space_invaders.funny_fact: Floop once threw a party in a black hole!

space_invaders.name: Worb
space_invaders.funny_fact: Worb is a champion of interstellar hopscotch!

space_invaders.name: Prax
space_invaders.funny_fact: Prax's favorite game is cosmic hide-and-seek!

space_invaders.name: Zim
space_invaders.funny_fact: Zim is a master of galactic chess!
